title: Poster, "China Image", 2004
provenance: Jianping He new to Cooper Hewitt, August 2014
description: Two Chinese characters spelling "China" and modelled in ceramic are placed in front of a background of white blossoms. Ceramic modelling fabricated by Sonny Kim.
justification: This poster, the earliest example of He’s work to be added to Cooper Hewitt’s collection, was designed for the Taiwan Poster Design Association. The poster features the two Chinese characters that together translate as "China." The characters were modelled in ceramic by artist Sonny Kim, and painted to recall the iconic blue and white floral pattern associated with the country. He staged these two ceramic models against a bough of white cherry blossoms.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "China Image", 2004. Screenprint on paper. Gift of Jianping He. 2014-23-1.
